snippet.title: The Sunday I Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The Sunday is a first person psychological horror game.

The idea of being home alone will hunt you, until the drakness settel in your brain. The line between reality and nightmare is razor-thin, so be careful.

The Sunday will be launched this summer.

Sound from: www.freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/
